sentences.en: (= about 12 ) cars were parked near the entrance.
sentences.cn: 入口附近停了大约十二辆汽车。

sentences.en: a dozen eggs
sentences.cn: 一打鸡蛋

sentences.en: A dozen inmates have absconded from Forest Jail in the past year.
sentences.cn: 去年共有12名犯人从福雷斯特监狱逃脱。

sentences.en: A dozen mounted police rode into the square.
sentences.cn: 十几名骑警进入了广场。

sentences.en: A dozen people were watching her, smirking at her discomfort.
sentences.cn: 有十来个人在看着她，对她不安的样子幸灾乐祸地笑着。

sentences.en: A dozen trees of various sorts were planted.
sentences.cn: 一共种了12棵不同种类的树。

sentences.en: Chris, Helen, and half a dozen others went on holiday together.
sentences.cn: 克里斯、海伦和其他六个人一起去度假了。

sentences.en: Ernest Brown lives about a dozen blocks from where the riots began.
sentences.cn: 欧内斯特·布朗住在离骚乱发生处几个街区远的地方。

sentences.en: Garbo made two dozen films, first silent pictures then talkies.
sentences.cn: 嘉宝拍过24部电影，先是无声的，后是有声的。

sentences.en: He sat behind a table on which were half a dozen files.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一张放有6个文件夹的桌子后面。

sentences.en: He was accompanied by an entourage of a dozen police officers.
sentences.cn: 他有12名警官随行。

sentences.en: His hair sticks up in half a dozen directions.
sentences.cn: 他的头发胡乱支棱着。

sentences.en: I was sitting only a dozen feet away.
sentences.cn: 我正坐在只有十几英尺远的地方。

sentences.en: One boy is more trouble than a dozen girls.
sentences.cn: 一个男孩比十二个女孩增添的麻烦还多。

sentences.en: Portentous choices were forced on him by the dozen.
sentences.cn: 众多事关重大的抉择强加在了他身上。

sentences.en: She loaded me down with around a dozen cassettes.
sentences.cn: 她塞给我十几盒磁带。

sentences.en: The list of drinks, a dozen pages long, makes fascinating reading.
sentences.cn: 酒水单一共有十几页长，读起来很有趣。

sentences.en: The project has gone through nearly a dozen years of planning.
sentences.cn: 该项目已历经近12年的规划。

sentences.en: The reduced price will save you one dollar for each dozen.
sentences.cn: 下调了的价格每一打将能节省你一个美元。

sentences.en: The riot left four people dead and several dozen injured.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中四人丧生，数十人受伤。

sentences.en: We collected dozens and dozens of shells on the beach.
sentences.cn: 我们在海滩上捡了很多很多贝壳。

sentences.en: We painted together every day. He presented me with half a dozen of his works, which are going to be in the exhibition.
sentences.cn: 我们每天一起画画，他给我看了半打他的画作，这些从未公诸于世过的作品，将会在这次画展中展出。

trans.tran_cn: 一打，十二个，十几个，许多
